title: Wall Street Week | Trump Picks Warsh, US State Capitalism, SNAP Cuts, Business of Youth Sports
description: This week, President Trump announces he intends to nominate Kevin Warsh as the next Fed Chair. Then, how government ownership  is changing competition, capital allocation, and the future of US markets. Plus, will cutting SNAP destabilize the grocery, farming, and food-bank economies? Later, how big money is transforming youth sports, driving up costs and changing how families chase athletic dreams. (Source: Bloomberg)
